headline: GOP stumbles, weak fundraising in Ga. and other states threaten path to Senate control
sentences: Rep. Val Demings, the leading Democrat in the race to unseat Florida Sen. Marco Rubio, acknowledged that her party has struggled to highlight its accomplishments  including sweeping coronavirus pandemic relief and a massive infrastructure package  in the face of President Joe Bidens political woes.
